channel.title: The Bonus Show
channel.itunes:author: Luke Lechel
channel.description: A podcast from Luke Lechel about technology, productivity, and fitness.
channel.itunes:subtitle: Luke Lechel

item.title: The Right Bike For the Job, with Rick Schroeder
item.itunes:subtitle: Rick Schroeder joins the show to talk bicycle gear and cycling culture.
item.description: Rick Schroeder joins the show to talk bicycle gear and cycling culture. Show Notes: WhatCulture Gaming Podcast (https://podcasts.apple.com/gb/podcast/whatculture-gaming/id1433583146) The Test Drivers Podcast (https://www.relay.fm/testdrivers) ARM acquisition by Nvidia - The Verge (https://www.theverge.com/2020/9/13/21435507/nvidia-acquiring-arm-40-billion-chips-ai-deal) United States presidential state car - Wikipedia (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Presidential_state_car_(United_States)) Wahoo Blue SC Speed and Cadence Cycling Sensor (https://www.wahoofitness.com/devices/bike-sensors/wahoo-blue-sc-speed-and-cadence-sensor) Under Armour Heart Rate Monitor Chest Strap (https://www.amazon.com/Under-Armour-Heart-Rate-Monitor/dp/B07PDNH6Q3) Nike+iPod Sports Kit (https://www.apple.com/in/ipod/nike/) Wahoo Fitness (https://www.wahoofitness.com/) Wahoo Fitness on the App Store (https://apps.apple.com/us/app/wahoo-fitness/id391599899) Apple Fitness+ (https://www.apple.com/apple-fitness-plus/) Follow the show: * TheBonusShow.com (https://thebonusshow.com) * ðŸ“¸ https://instagram.com/thebonusshow * ðŸ—£ https://twitter.com/thebonusshow

item.title: The Future of Fitness, with Misael Contreras
item.itunes:subtitle: Misael Contreras joins the inaugural episode of The Bonus Show to discuss exercise tips and tools in a world without gyms.
item.description: Misael Contreras joins the inaugural episode of The Bonus Show to discuss exercise tips and tools in a world without gyms.
